Articles.Content:
Hello Kerbals!

I thought everyone introduces himself, so why not me, right?

I'm Kasimir from Germany and currently a student.

I bought KSP some months ago (3 or sth.) and I enjoyed the game since then so much.

It is now the most played game in my steam game list after such games like Call of Duty and even Battlefield 3!

Since I bought the game I wanted to make something like an addon how the big guys here .

After I managed to land at Mun without Mechjeb, the new Update came out and the flags inspired me for an idea.

So this is what I am working on to make the game a bit more interesting (not that it would need that):

KerbalFlags Flag Exchange

What is that?

Well, we can now travel to the Mun or the other moon or even other planets in the Kerbal sunsystem. And many of us will plant their flags there, right?

KerbalFlags is a website and a Java App that provides you the ability to add your friends' flags into the game!

Awesome right?

I'll publish KerbalFlags when I have a stable build.

Leave some comments if you wanna say hi to me too or have an idea to improve what i suggested (And yeah I thought about doing this for Space Stations too)

That's about all of me.

Wish you all a great liftoff!

Thank you!

I have some questions tough:

Does anyone know how to get the Planet from the save file out?

Also I saw that the pid of some flags are, well not really set (normally it's like: c9ff3c9c9fc34c6c8c63cb53bde6426f and some have simply 00000000000000000000000000000000 why is that?)

I believe in a month I'll be launching the script.
